name: Phobos: Prologue
description:
A horror role-playing game. Travel throughout the town of Phobos to uncover the truth behind a string of human disappearances and recover the memories of an ailing amnesiac. Phobos features two single player campaigns from the perspectives of two different protagonists.

Gamepad controllers are supported (analog stick required.)

Phobos is currently in it's prologue stage and is not yet a finished product. (Demo.)

Developer: http://nextcosmos.com/

Minimum System Requirements

OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)

CPU: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor

RAM: 512 MB or more

HDD: 344 MB or more free space

Other: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
